Intent: Acad_Axi_CD_L3_Buenas prácticas al navegar por internet
Query: Good practices when browsing the internet
Responses: Buenas prácticas al navegar por internet *Evitar conectarse a las redes wifi públicas o gratuitas disponibles. *Descargar aplicaciones desde las tiendas o páginas web oficiales. *Asegurarse de que la página web donde se ingresan datos sensibles empiece con HTTPS. *Cambiar periódicamente las contraseñas en los diferentes servicios de internet. *Cifrar la información sensible y los datos personales antes de compartirlos. *No permitir a cookies de terceros almacenar tus registros de navegación.

Query: What is an essay?

Query: Internal communication

Query: Intrapersonal communication

Responses: Mass Communication: Type of communication that refers to the design and transmission of content to a heterogeneous and anonymous audience through a communication medium.

Query: Persuasive communication

Query: Inference

Query: What is Pre-reading?

Query: Types of sustainable development approaches

Query: What is the sectoral approach?
Responses: The sectoral approach refers to the fact that a specific productive sector will be sustainable, if the productive process does not impact the environment and, at the same time, is economically profitable. The sectoral approach is limited above all to adequately planning the activities to be developed, carrying out various plans for the use of natural resources, carrying out regional resource management studies, cost-benefit studies of development projects, risk and environmental impact studies, with a micro range of regionalization and selecting the least harmful technology to nature.

Query: What is the  first  project about?
Responses: For the project part 1 you will have to develop a script to produce a video (with a duration of 3 to 5 minutes) in session 7, about the process of self-knowledge that you have developed throughout the subject. The video will be titled My Best Version. For this part of the script you will be able to take up the information that you consider pertinent from the activities carried out in the challenges of the subject Write the text of the video script in the first person, start it by talking about who you are, who are the people who have influenced the person you are you are today. Locate your place in the context in which you find yourself, talk about the environment that surrounds you, what are your values and what decisions have allowed you to get to where you are today (personally and professionally) Considering what was reviewed in the session 3, include your participation as a citizen and as a professional in your community, make sure that this part of the text reflects your vision of the moment you are living and what you can do to improve it. Your work should include the cover with the identification data and the video template that you will find in session 3, learning unit 6. Send this file with the name PI1_Name and Surname.PDF
